proj.abbi.playback

Class ContinuousActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • proj.abbi.playback.ContinuousActivity

  • public class ContinuousActivity
extends Activity
    This class represents the activity associated with the continuous sound emission. It uses layout circular seekbars in order to allow the user to control the sound volume and pitch (frequency)
